childI18NJson.title: Hamster Village
childI18NJson.description: Hamster Village is a collection of 1111 unique Hamsters who live in a small village. The village itself is located on NEAR Blockchain. Our main goal is to build the friendliest and largest NEAR village in the Metaverse and create  the best, interesting and addictive play-to-earn game out there. Welcome to Hamster Village!
